snippet.title: The Forsaken Ruins - Development Vlog #1
snippet.description:
2nd March 2020

This is the first Dev-Diary which showcases the development of The Forsaken Ruins from Week 7. TFR is a university final major project and is currently undergoing Early Access. 

The Forsaken Ruins is an atmospheric horror game. Beginning in a cell, you play as Subject J-73 and your main goal is to escape the ruins alive. Pick up objects, solve puzzles, avoid monsters and blow up prison doors to make your escape!

For more information, please visit the Tumblr page or show your support by downloading the game on Steam and becoming apart of the TFR community! Any comments or general suggestions would be greatly appreciated to help build this game!

Tumblr Page:
https://jackeddieself97.tumblr.com/

The Forsaken Ruins Steam Page:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1311670/The_Forsaken_Ruins/
